sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lou 瘺 , fistula. Pu ji fang 普濟方 292: 琥珀膏，治頸項瘰癧，初起如 梅子，腫結硬強，漸若連珠，或穿穴膿潰，流汁不絕，經久難瘥，漸成 瘺疾，並治之 , “Ointment with hu po : It cures scrofula pervasion-illness at the neck. In their beginning they rise like a plum kernel. The swelling is unyielding and stiff. Gradually it assumes the appearance of a string of pearls. In some cases holes develop, releasing pus. The flow of liquid is continuous. This lasts long and is difficult to heal. Eventually this develops into a fistula ailment . It serves to cure all [these conditions] alike”.
